name: Yoda's Hope
Lore: '''You must feel the Force around you. Here, between you, me, the tree, the rock, everywhere! Yes, even between the land and the ship.''',
Text: 'Deploy on a character. When on the mentor, adds 1 to training destiny draws. If on Yoda, you may lose Effect to search your Reserve Deck and take into hand one card with ''levitation'' in the title. Shuffle, cut and replace.',
